object.name: ChatBoost
object.description: This object contains information about a chat boost.
object.html_description: This object contains information about a chat boost.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about a chat boost.

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the chat was boosted
annotations.html_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the chat was boosted
annotations.rst_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the chat was boosted
annotations.name: add_date

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the boost will automatically expire, unless the booster's Telegram Premium subscription is prolonged
annotations.html_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the boost will automatically expire, unless the booster's Telegram Premium subscription is prolonged
annotations.rst_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the boost will automatically expire, unless the booster's Telegram Premium subscription is prolonged
annotations.name: expiration_date
